title: Base Breadcrumb Template
description: Standard structure for all RCRT breadcrumbs - use as reference when creating new breadcrumbs

context.purpose: Defines standard breadcrumb structure for LLM-assemblability

standard_structure.title: string (REQUIRED) - Short human-readable name
standard_structure.description: string (OPTIONAL) - Detailed description - NEW: Top-level for easier queries
standard_structure.semantic_version: string (OPTIONAL) - Semantic version (e.g., '2.0.0') - NEW: Top-level for consistency
standard_structure.llm_hints: object (OPTIONAL) - Instance-level LLM optimization - NEW: Top-level, overrides schema defaults
standard_structure.ttl_type: string (OPTIONAL) - TTL type: never, datetime, duration, usage, hybrid

llm_hints_structure.description: LLM optimization hints - controls how breadcrumb appears to LLMs
llm_hints_structure.location: Top-level ONLY - NOT in context (breaking change from v2.0)

best_practices: Use semantic_version for component versioning (NEW: top-level, not in context)
Use description for detailed info (NEW: top-level for easy queries)
Use llm_hints at breadcrumb level to customize per-instance (NEW: overrides schema)
Keep context for schema-specific data only
Use meaningful tags for routing and discovery
Use schema_name to enable type-specific behavior
Set appropriate TTL for ephemeral data
breaking_changes_v2.1: description, semantic_version, llm_hints are TOP-LEVEL only
NO support for context.version, context.description, context.llm_hints
Clean break - new structure is the ONLY structure

guide.format: Base Breadcrumb Template: Standard structure with {llm_hints_structure.precedence}
